about_the_game:
In the game, players will face various challenges and obstacles, and need to solve puzzles, explore and fight to continuously improve their spiritual cultivation. Players can communicate with other living beings, learn the wisdom of ancient immortal cultivation legends and explore the mysteries of ascension. At the same time, players can also collect elixirs, spirit stones and other treasures in the game to enhance their abilities and cultivation in order to better pursue the path of ascension.

1、Open world with multiple floating islands;
2、Multiplayer co-op (10-30 players) , you can explore alone or adventure and fight with your buddies;
3, Ground combat as well as air fights, etc. You can also build your own territory on land;

short_description: Why Taoism Is an adventure game that explores spirituality and transcendence. In this game, players will take on the role of a group of beings who follow the legends of the ancient immortals and hope to ascend in order to transcend.
